name: Christian Thurston
title: COO SearchEye
body: The quality of Joey’s work is great, and I’ve always found him both easy to work with, and professional in his approach. Not only would I recommend him to others, I already have.

name: Arvin Dang
title: Sr. Product Designer - Table XI
body: I recommend Joey often to other clients because of his reliability, focus, and approach. I trust him with my clients, my work, and I very much look forward to future opportunities together.

name: Devon Hennig
title: VP of Marketing - Docebo
body: Joey is exactly who you want working on your web project. Extremely responsive, extremely professional, 110% recommend.

name: Loyld Silver
title: Founder & CEO - ContentRamp
body: I've wasted so much time looking for a great developer. I'm now done looking. Joey has completely exceeded my expectations on all. He's an absolute pleasure to work with.

name: Wyatt Mayham
title: Director of SEO, MyHealthTeams
body: Joey is my go to for design/development. If you need a full stack guy that gets the job done quickly, efficiently and professionally, he is your guy.

name: Josh
title: Founder, Passion into Paychecks
body: I have worked with Joey on multiple projects and he's been great. Highly recommend him for any dev work you have. The best experience i have had working with devs.
